TextLines: RULES PAGE
Rule #1 No spamming Supply Drops, 5 Supply Drops every 15 minutes.
Rule #2 Any variation of the word 'Admin' or 'Moderator' in your name or clan name will result in
a kick. You will be given the chance to change your name, if you fail to you WILL be <color=red> BANNED </color>.
This is not Fortnite... Do not build while being raided!
No god damn Racism or Homophobia, If you are racist in chat you will be <color=red> BANNED </color>.
No building in the map, No clipping turrets, No clipping under the map. MAX BASE SIZE IS 15x15
Click Next Page to view available Commands!
Commands! Any commands in <color=red>Red</color> are donation commands.
<color=lime>/buy</color> Shows vehicles for purchase <color=lime>/spawn</color> spawns them. <color=lime>/bandit</color> teleports to bandit camp
<color=lime>/kit</color> to view kits. <color=lime>/tpr</color> to request to teleport to a player. <color=lime>/tpa</color> to accept requests.
<color=lime>/home</color> shows home commands. <color=lime>/sil</color> to add images to signs and paintings. <color=lime>/clan</color> shows clan commands
In chat, type /pbreg 'Your Username#7263' to register you to the discord
Go to Next Page to view more commands
<color=lime>/bed</color> for bed commands.  makes a recycler. <color=lime>/backpack</color> shows backpack commands.
<color=lime>/bgrade</color> Auto upgrades while building. <color=lime>/friend add</color> Adds a friend <color=lime>/where</color> helps find your corpse.
<color=lime>/skin</color> Bring up skin changer. <color=lime>/bounty</color> Shows bounty commands
<color=red>/sc</color> Shows commands for Security Cameras. <color=red>/sdoor</color> Turn your door into a sliding door!
<color=lime>/nextwipe</color> To view wipe timer
Please
Read
Logs
Before
Bitching
At Me

Tabs.HeaderText: This is where you view donor rewards!

TextLines: All donor rewards can be acquired at KODYGAMES.NET
You can unlock all the skins buy paying $5 in the store. Its worth it if you like skins!
With every kit you will get a donor tag/group added to your name.
Some kits or packs may come with unique tags/groups based on their type and the items they contain
The 'Raid Kit', never expires and has unlimited uses. It does have a 1 hour cooldown though.
RP does not reset after map wipes.
Trading the M249 is strictly forbidden and can result in the kit getting revoked
